subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|秫}} ''(The complex form of 朮)''
* {{l|mul|术}} ''({{w|zh:新字形|Standardized form}} in mainland China, also the {{w|Simplified Chinese|simplified form}} of {{l|mul|術}})''

subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* <font size=4, lang=zh-Hant>[[𠰲#Translingual|𠰲]], [[𡊍#Translingual|𡊍]], [[怵#Translingual|怵]], [[𢫖#Translingual|𢫖]], [[沭#Translingual|沭]], [[𣭍#Translingual|𣭍]], [[炢#Translingual|炢]], [[㺷#Translingual|㺷]], [[述#Translingual|述]], [[𥄵#Translingual|𥄵]], [[秫#Translingual|秫]], [[䘤#Translingual|䘤]], [[絉#Translingual|絉]], [[𦈭#Translingual|𦈭]], [[訹#Translingual|訹]], [[䟣#Translingual|䟣]], [[鉥#Translingual|鉥]], [[𩖶#Translingual|𩖶]], [[𪲭#Translingual|𪲭]], [[術#Translingual|術]], [[𫀦#Translingual|𫀦]], [[𣏂#Translingual|𣏂]], [[𦬸#Translingual|𦬸]], [[㾁#Translingual|㾁]]</font> ''(Exception: Only for {{w|zh:國字標準字體|Taiwan}} and {{w|zh:常用字字形表|Hong Kong}} character forms. {{w|zh:新字形|Mainland China}} character form contains {{l|mul|术}} instead)''
* <font size=4, lang=zh-Hant-TW>[[𤇍#Translingual|𤇍]]</font> ''(Exception: Only for {{w|zh:國字標準字體|Taiwan}} character form. {{w|zh:常用字字形表|Hong Kong}} character form contains {{l|mul|术}} instead)''
* {{l|mul|怷}} ''(Contains <big>朮</big> and not {{l|mul|术}})''

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}}. It is the original character of [[秫]].

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# used in compounds like [[白术]], a type of [[herbal]] [[medicine]]

subSections.title: Kanji
Readings
subSections.text: * {{ja-readings|goon=[[じゅち]]/[[ぢゅち]] (juchi), [[じゅつ]] (jutsu), [[すち]] (zuchi)|kanon=[[しゅつ]] (shutsu), [[ちゅつ]] (chutsu)|kun=[[もちあわ]] (mochiawa), [[おけら]] (okera)}}
